biography: Mikael, a celebrated name from Kurk Golf, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. Though possessing a reserved exterior, Mikael is admired by his peers for his insightful observations and his commitment to the traditions of golf.

With one past appearance at the Hector Trophée, Mikael has shown great dedication to the sport. While he may not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, his contributions to the past events have certainly left a mark.
Despite his supposed retirement from Hector events, supporters of Mikael hold out hope that he may one day return to the competition.
